projects.name: Bookmarking App
projects.description:
NodeJS application for storing bookmarks and provide the JSON data used to display the bookmarks here.

Uses the Express framework for NodeJS, Postgres and deployed to Heroku.

projects.name: Web Tooling and Automation
projects.description:
Courses selected from the Data Science Specialisation on coursera.

Includes R Programming; Getting, Cleaning and Exploring Data and Statistical Inference.

projects.name: Coursera Statistics Course
projects.description:
Some of the tools and techniques used by web developers.

An online course through Udacity, built by Google.

Covered Productive Editing and optimising your editor (Sublime Text), Build Tools to automate your build (Gulp), Live Editing for a smoother workflow, Linting, Unit testing and Optimisation for performance.

projects.name: Turtles and L-Systems
projects.description: Experiments with a Javascript 'turtle' graphics tool for drawing on the HTML Canvas. Can be programmed using Lindenmayer System grammer to weird effect.

projects.name: To Do App
projects.description: A learning project, the boring ToDo app, using AngularJS, PHP and MySQL.

projects.name: Crafting Quality Code
projects.description:
Programming course on Coursera, covering some of the fundamental skills for a (Python) programmer.

Includes design of functions & organising modular code, algorithm performance, automated unit testing and debugging.
